Classes in jigl.image used by jigl.image
BinaryImage
          BinaryImage is a 2-d array of byte.
ColorImage
          A color image is a set of three gray image planes.
ColorModelNotSupportedException
          Exception for a Color model that is not supported
ColorModelUnknownException
          Exception for a color model is not defined by JIGL
ComplexImage
          A complex image is a set of two real gray image planes.
GrayImage
          GrayImage is a 2-d array of shorts
Image
          Image is the interface for ColorImage, ComplexImage, ConvertSignal, DiscreteSignal In addition, all typed Image classes must support the following typed methods: get set clear ...
ImageKernel
          ImageKernel is an extension of GrayImage with some pre-defined kernals.
InvalidKernelException
          Exception for an invalid Kernel
RealColorImage
          A color image is a set of three gray image planes.
RealGrayImage
          RealGrayImage is a 2-d array of floats
ROI
          The ROI class is the Region of Interest of a JIGL Image
